alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 12:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...An area of moderate thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lander, north central Nye and southwestern Eureka Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1220 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking across northeast Nye and southern Eureka counties. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Brief moderate to heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief heavy rain could cause ponding of water on local roadways, causing slick driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Antelope Peak, Little Fish Lake Valley, Monitor Valley and Table Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
